learningIntro.title: What information would you like to train?
learningIntro.content:
After the training is over,
I'll set up a channel to collect necessary feeds.
I'll let you know when the feed collection is done!

learningDoc.title: Are there any documents you want to train?

learningTag.title: Which topic or content you want to train?
learningTag.recommend:
I recommend
topics that has spiked.

learningWeb.title: Are there any social channels for training?
learningWeb.recommend: I recommend a list of major sites by category.
learningWeb.placeHolderInput: Type the category of the website.

learningSocial.title: Are there any social channels for training?

learningManagement.title: The detailed meanings of the topic are called entity.

search.description: Search for interesting postings and train them.

web.description: Register for URL and train it.

document.description: Choose a document you want to train.

learningCenter.title: Training Center
learningCenter.enterSearchKeywordAndSelectContent: Enter a search keyword and select a content.
learningCenter.noWebResult: There is no new web result.
learningCenter.enterUrlOrPasteUrl: Enter the URL in the input box at the top or paste the URL.
learningCenter.addFileFromComputerOrDraggingFile:
Select a file from My Computer and Shared Drives, or
you can add files by dragging them with the mouse.
learningCenter.unsupportedFileType: Your files you just selected is not supported. Please choose the following file types:
learningCenter.learningGuide1: Depending on the amount of the training, it may take some time to train. If you want to check the completion of training, please check 'Notification of completion of training' below.
learningCenter.learningGuide2: You can check the list of completed training in [<a style='color:#007bff'>Trained Document<a/>]
